quote: We've been dealing with ICE, we've been dealing with the Border Patrol. They both endorsed me; first time they've ever endorsed a candidate for President.
quotePlain: We’ve been dealing with ICE, we’ve been dealing with the Border Patrol. They both endorsed me; first time they’ve ever endorsed a candidate for President.
name: Donald Trump

checks.quote: Neither the Border Patrol nor Immigration and Customs Enforcement endorsed Trump for president. They are government agencies and can’t endorse anyone politically. Two unions representing border and immigration agents who work for those agencies endorsed him.
checks.quotePlain: Neither the Border Patrol nor Immigration and Customs Enforcement endorsed Trump for president. They are government agencies and can’t endorse anyone politically. Two unions representing border and immigration agents who work for those agencies endorsed him.

claims.title: ICE endorsed Trump
claims.truth: Only its union, which represents about ¼ of its employees, did.
claims.truthPlain: Only its union, which represents about ¼ of its employees, did.

claims.title: the US Border Patrol endorsed Trump
claims.negative: the US Border Patrol didn't endorse Trump
claims.negativePlain: the US Border Patrol didn’t endorse Trump
